description: Demonstrates soundings (Tree of Thought) for creative writing

phases.name: draft_opening
phases.instructions: Write an engaging opening paragraph for a short story about {{ input.theme }}. Be creative and varied in your approach.

soundings.evaluator_instructions: You are an expert creative writing instructor. Evaluate the following story openings based on: 1) Hook strength - does it grab attention? 2) Originality - is it fresh and unique? 3) Writing quality - is the prose clear and compelling? Select the BEST opening.

phases.name: develop_story
phases.instructions: Continue the story from this opening: {{ outputs.draft_opening }}. Write 2-3 more paragraphs to develop the narrative.
